title: My Wangfei is a Man - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Amnesia   Ancient China   Arranged Marriage   Doting Older Siblings   Doting Parents   Drugs   Heartwarming   Marriage   Mpreg   Reversible Couple   Royalty   R*pe   Seme Protagonist
author: Shi Shi   十世
description: After a heavy illness, Prince Dong Fang Hao Ye wakes up with a memory lost. When he meets the Prince consort Bei Tang Yao Yue afterwards, one word came to his mind: beauty. Even though he no longer remembers Bei Tang Yao Yue, his manly instinct remains the same. But what is going on, why is his wangfei a man? The beauty who made his heart restless is actually a man. What surprises the prince even more is that he actually has no position in his own house! Not only that, he also did not have a ‘good relationship’ with his beloved consort. How can this be? To save face, he the prince, must toughen up!>
